features: 【2.4G Wireless Transmission】This wireless lavalier microphone uses 2.4G wireless international universal frequency band.Featured with fast connection, high signal stability, low interference and short audio delay. The transmission distance between the transmitter and the receiver can reach 120m (393ft) without obstacles.

【3 in 1 Universal Receiver】 The upgraded lapel microphone comes with a 3 in 1 universal receiver, eliminating the need to replace multiple individual interfaces or interface cables. It is compatible with a wide range of devices such as iPhone, iPad, Android phones, DSLR cameras, laptops, etc.

【Smart Noise Cancellation】The lavalier microphone features noise reduction technology that helps to minimize ambient sound and improve audio quality. Whether you're recording a podcast, giving a presentation, or conducting an interview, this microphone is an excellent choice for achieving professional-level audio results.

【Dual-People Pickup Mic】With the dual wireless microphone, it is possible to record the voices of multiple people simultaneously.It is a convenient feature for those who need to capture high-quality audio on multiple devices at the same time, such as during interviews or live performances.

【Automatic Connection & Real-time Monitor】 The plug-and-play function allows for easy and quick setup without the need for additional drivers or software. The real-time monitoring feature allows users to monitor the audio being recorded directly through earphones, ensuring accurate and clear sound recording.

【18 Months Warranty】 We prioritize your satisfaction and provide a 18-month warranty for our lavalier mic, along with 24/7 customer service. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please let us know and we will work to provide you with a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can I use the microphone on my camera to record video? Yes, this microphone is a 3-in-1 device, which means it can support IOS, Android, and 3.5mm camera connections. Can I use the microphone while charging it at the same time? Yes, you can use the microphone while charging. Why can I only record audio but NOT video for Oppo/Vivo/Oneplus phones with the mics,it there any addtional settings? 1) If your phone has OTG function, please manually turn on OTG. 2) For Oppo/Vivo/Oneplus or some other Andriod phones, may need to set up manuallyas below: Settings > Sound & vibration > Other settings > Defaultrecorder > Use peripheral device. Will it connect to a bluetooth speaker? Yes,our microphone supports most TRS and TRRS 3.5mm jack Bluetooth speakers or amplifiers. This means that you can try plugging the receiver into the headphone jack of a Bluetooth speaker or amplifier and listen to the voice through the speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really good! This product is a game-changer for anyone in need of professional-grade audio. Its wireless, noise-reducing capabilities deliver crystal-clear sound across devices. The ease of use, combined with its versatility for iPhone, Android, and camera compatibility, makes it perfect for interviews and vlogs for me. And the sound is really clear. Highly recommended for its superior quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super simple set up, great for basic sound bytes wirelessly
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for additional sound pickup on cooking videos.Tested using the mics while walking around and speaking vs using just my phone mic.I clipped the mic to my shirt collar near my mouth.With natural phone mic:Phone noise reduction was top notch for the Pixel. Voice was clearer but very soft.With MAXTOP mic:There was a bit of background noise and background feedback.The sound of my voice was definitely louder. When I pointed the mic directly at my mouth and pulled the mic closer, the sound quality was a lot better and clearer.I think with some post production the benefits would shine brighter.Pros:WirelessSimple to use and set up.2 Mics that can be used in tandem.This type of mic is perfect for using during simple interviews or discussions with 2 people.Don't clip the mics on something that moves around a lot.Point the mics towards the sound you're trying to pick up.Solid 4/5 product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! It comes with two microphones and is very simple to use. I have an Android you just connect it into the USB-C, turn it on, and you are good to go! The sound quality is great and it works perfect for hearing your voice loud and clear while you are capturing footage from farther away or when there is a lot of other external noise. Great price for a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use and portable size
reviews.reviewText: Very self-explanation to use, just open the box and plug in, then press the button. Such small-sized products but very useful and good sound quality. Very portable so very ideal to take out for vlogging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You see it
reviews.reviewText: If ya looking for something cheaply priced and effective, this will get the job done. Though not much better than talking directly into the phone(iPhone), it does offer a pop filter on both mics and a pretty easy to use interface. Works as expected for low end recordings. Would suggest to someone looking for something to get them started.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down - most versatile mics ever and excellent sound quality!
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, I am so impressed with the quality of these microphones! I work in marketing for real estate and do a lot of voiceovers as well as on camera social posts for the properties we feature. I think the best part about this microphone set is that I can use them on my newer iPhone, but my coworker can use it on her lower generation phone. So easy just to flip that receiver to accommodate whatever phone you have. But what really blew me away was the sound quality. In fact, I have used it in my studio to tape voiceovers on my phone and import those into my editing software because I find the voiceovers to be so crystal clear. Highly recommend this. Can’t believe the price for such a little powerhouse duo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Captures audio well
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Only 3 stars because the receiver that plugs into the phone is so large it interrupts the gimbal movement. I’ll have to purchase something else to fit my needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works well for a podcast recording, even covered. Very easy to set up and get going. However doesn’t work very well for karaoke singing when connected via the RCA jack. There is a significant delay compared to wired mikes.

My review is based on value. I boughts to replace a $250 single lapel wireless mic I had purchased for my then GoPro in 2012 (mic batteries now defunct). Sound is even better and probably similar to the iPhone native mic. Much more compact than old lav mike. It a mono system, if both mikes are used, they are mushed into a mono channel. On tests in an open space, absolutely no interference and audio drops outs started at 80-90 m. I guess it would be much less in a building. Extremely simple, automatically pairs and just works. Studio grade mikes ($$) will have better audio specs and better security and interference rejection, many more options, thats my assumption.

This wireless microphone is user-friendly easy to use, delivering crystal-clear sound. Its remarkable converter seamlessly connects to iPhone, Samsung, and camera ports. Compact and lightweight, it ensures convenience without compromising audio quality. I am happy with that also great value for price.
Very easy to use, recorded a video with mic and it comes out very clear voice.Amazing packing and easy connectivity.

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't hold a charge for very long and has connectivity issues at times.

I'm impressed with the performance of this 3-in-1 Mini Wireless Lavalier Microphone. Its compact design doesn't compromise on audio quality, providing clear and crisp sound. The wireless functionality adds convenience, and the versatility to use it as a handheld or clip it on makes it a great tool for various recording situations.
